item.title: Dark Magic 黑魔法
item.description:
Dark Magic [v0.21.0] [F. Lord]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You grew up in an ordinary family with an ordinary life, except for the fact, you’re the only man alive in the world! You’ve been living among beautiful girls in the Kingdom, yet, you still have no real actions with any girls.
  • Then everything changed when you met The Red Witch.
  • The one who will teach you about the magic power.
  • The one who will pull you into the Dark Magic world.
  • All girls in the Kingdom are awaiting you to meet them.
  • Now it’s your chance to corrupt them all!
  • " This game is huge, hard, and really long, so please take your time playing and enjoy! “​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.21.0
  • 发行日期：2026-01-26

Changelog

更新日志
  • Fixed missing Book of Memory pages
  • Reworked Drunk mom scene
  • Reworked Hitomi massage room images
  • Reworked Onsen & Spa images
  • Updated Magic Notes
  • Updated Book of Red (Patron)
  • Added new music and sound effects
  • Added new feature: “Immerse” in Open Book
  • Added Onsen & Spa front door images
  • Added Book of Lover new page: Pamela
  • Added Taka to Room Masturbation
  • Added/Updated Journey (Open Book)
  • Added 6 Christmas journey images
  • Added Love Letter in Portrait for Airi and Momoko
  • Added night conversation with Taka
  • Added morning conversaion with Chizue
  • Added new conversaion with Yamiyo
  • Added new conversaion with Red Witch (1on1)
  • Added new conversaion with Ruriko (1on1)
  • Added new conversaion with Yasuko
  • Added new conversaion with Namie
  • Added new conversaion with Hitomu (Massage Room)
  • Added new conversaion with Hitomi
  • Update Book of Memory:
    • Momoko: +5 Pages
    • Red Witch: +1 Page
    • Taka: +1 Page
    • School: +1 Page
    • Other: +2 Pages

Developer（入正地址）

  • SubscribeStar
  • Patreon
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 我没有玩过这游戏，水友让我跑的汉化，游戏内的任务，词条，我都提取并通过ai意译，可玩性很高。
汉化补丁更新日志
  • 2026.01.30 00:30
    • 修复对话中地点不显示汉化的bug。
  • 2026.01.30 20:00
    • 修复爱理任务报错的bug。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-30
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

DOWNLOAD（汉化补丁）

Win/Linux（PC端）

  1. 下载链接：
  • 英文原版：GOFILE
  • 英文原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正楷字体：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正圆字体：VIKINGFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版和AI意译汉化补丁
  • 解压英文原版压缩包文件
  • 将汉化补丁rpa文件放入game文件夹中
  • 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可
  • 如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒

Android（安卓端）

  1. 下载链接：
  • 英文原版：GOFILE
  • 英文原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正楷字体：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正圆字体：VIKINGFILE
  • 主体APK：GOFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版、AI意译汉化补丁和主体APK
  • 安装APK文件
  • 启动游戏，放行所有权限
  • 这时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，就自己手动大退
  • 然后解压英文原版压缩包文件
  • 将英文原版game文件夹中的所有文件及文件夹和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到以下路径： 
    1

    Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.flord.DarkMagic/game
  • 最后启动游戏，选择简体中文即可
  • PS：移动端如果看不全路径，请向左滑动代码块。
  • 如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒

iOS（苹果端）

  1. 环境配置：
  • 苹果端需使用Spark模拟器进行游玩
  • Spark模拟器AppStore有售
  1. 下载链接：
  • 英文原版：GOFILE
  • 英文原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正楷字体：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正圆字体：VIKINGFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版和AI意译汉化补丁
  • 打开Spark模拟器导入英文原版压缩包文件，不用解压，不用解压，不用解压，重要的事情说三遍
  • 然后将汉化补丁rpa文件移动到以下路径： 
    1

    我的iPhone/Spark/games/DarkMagic/game
  • 最后启动游戏，选择简体中文即可
  • PS：移动端如果看不全路径，请向左滑动代码块。
  • 如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒

item.title: Echoes of 2990 2990的回声
item.description:
Echoes of 2990 [Ch.2 0.2.3] [AADev]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The year is 2990. You’re a rebellious punk fresh out of high school — all defiance and devil-may-care charm — until one punch changes everything. It was supposed to be just another fight, another middle finger to the system. But your opponent? Your teacher. His fist didnât just knock you down — it knocked something loose. Now you’re seeing flashes of the future. This isn’t a gift. It’s a glitch in reality. And it’s your ticket onto a high-stakes deep-space mission, alongside a crew of sassy, seductive women.
  • Destination: Andromeda
  • Mission: Forge a new world, connect with alien civilizations, and carve your legacy — as a king, a conqueror… or the heart of a harem. The story is yours to shape.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py

item.title: Isekai Paradise 异世界天堂
item.description:
Isekai Paradise [v0.7 Patreon] [Soultice]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Just after graduating college, your life wasn’t going so great… No job, no prospects, and then… a truck. Yep, you die in a car accident by a truck-kun. But instead of staying dead, you wake up in Evenralm, a fantasy world full of magic, monsters, and adventures just like manga or anime.
  • With a new lease on life, you’re ready to chase your wildest dream: becoming the Harem King and taking down the Demon Lord! Along the way, you’ll gather a diverse group of amazing women from all corners of Evenralm… Humans, elves, demons, dragons, and more to join you on your lewd adventure.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.7 Patreon
  • 发行日期：2025-12-07

Changelog

更新日志
  • 25,000++ words
  • 1554 rendered photos
  • 539 animations (H-Scene)
  • Added 6 H-Scene (Velera, Melfa, Vivianne, and Vega)
  • Change Vega’s status (Main Character)
  • Remove Chinese language (will add soon in the patch)

Developer（入正地址）

  • Itch.io
  • Patreon
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 这次没九龙抱柱，九龙抱柱已经陨落了，用V3模型花费一坤元，0.1-0.7从头到尾跑出来的AI意译，原汁原味，落谦只是七七八八修了一下专有名词，我是一句话都不敢改啊！！！被喷怕了！！！放过孩子吧！！！

item.title: Murmur 低语
item.description:
Murmur [v0.7 Hotfix] [Devil’s Dad]

Overview

剧情概要
  • It is a story about love and lust in our lives, about what their absence leads to and what forms they can take. In this game, you’ll be playing as a 29-year-old guy who gets involved in unexpected mystical events. His life gets turned on its head and he has to survive in the new world he’s found himself in. But it’s not as grim as it seems at first glance. As you play, you’ll meet girls who need you just like you need them. Will you make them yours, seduce them, or cherish and love them? It’s up to you. Each of them has their own background, character, and hidden fetishes…​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.7 Public Hotfix
  • 发行日期：2025-05-15

Changelog

更新日志
  • Fixed the error message that appeared while telling Sophie the truth If you experience an error on launch with “File “game/definitions.rpy”, line 180” - Please redownload the game
  • New content: story continuation after the date with Yui
  • New UI design: main menu, load\save menu, settings, new music credits, updated gallery, dialogue window, choice menu and love menu with girls points
  • New visual notifications for love\lewd points and other info
  • New section called “Other” for the gallery, and new wallpapers and arts in corresponding sections
  • Love menu now contains “events” that had place in your playthrough, but for old save not all previous events will be displayed, it’s not critical, but if you want to see all “events” listed there you’ll need to start new game
  • Save\load pages now remember your scroll position, just as gallery will remember what page you were on
  • Bug and other fixes

Developer（入正地址）

  • Itch.io
  • Patreon
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 很纯很暧昧，这游戏玩下来很甜，尤其结衣甜的犯规，而且文风很舒服，男主人设也三观在线，没粗话，没damn，情商很高，总得来说，作者文笔很强，不尬，设定也好，目前在我这里排第四，虽然女主有种日漫番剧倒贴的既视感，嗯，没错，就是成人版的五等分的花嫁，但是我就好这一口，我玩完futa，ntl，女性堕落，再来一把这个，简直太带派了。

item.description:
Futa’s World of NTR [v1.4.2] [ScarletGames]

Overview

剧情概要
  • After ten long years of protecting her foster family from her little secret, a young futanari finally takes off her chastity belt upon entering high school, eager to explore her repressed degeneracy and satisfy all of her immoralities.
  • Surrounded by sluts and innocents alike, she finds herself in an ever so sweet paradox of non-ending depravity and ntr.
  • The plowing starts from Day 1!

item.title: Cosy Cafe 温馨咖啡馆
item.description:
Cosy Cafe [v0.13.1 Public] [Cosy Creator]

Overview

剧情概要

  • Your rough childhood is over, and you stand on the precipice of adulthood with a singular goal in mind: To become an exceptional restaurateur like your grandfather. But for now, you’ll settle for building a modest cafe. Money is tight, and challenges abound balancing your dream with your final year of school, but with hard work and determination you know that you can build a life for yourself and the girls you meet along the way.

  • In Cosy Cafe you will develop romantic and increasingly sexual relationships with a number of girls, culminating in a harem that eventually becomes a family. There will be a particular focus on wholesome maledom, and of course, there will be a lot of loving and kinky sex!

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.13.1 Public
  • 发行日期：2025-11-28

Changelog

更新日志
  • Multiple typos and a couple of missing dialogue lines that were added back in.
  • Fixed bug where train sounds kept playing after Akatsuki’s date
  • Fixed rare crashing problem on the save/load screen (temporarily disabled the save page number bar at the bottom scrolling while I work on a more permanent fix)
  • Fixed Annabelle’s page in the replay gallery - this was added in 0.12.1 then accidentally reverted in 0.13.0
  • Fixed related bug on android where the group scenes in the gallery displayed as Annabelle scenes Fixed bug in the android version where about a dozen of the videos had weird transparent cropping on the edges
  • Updated the patch version to fix an issue with pre-0.13 videos flashing up a transparency page when patching from 0.12.0 instead of 0.12.1

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Subscribestar
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 这游戏在外网好火，听说很暖很暧昧？这让我想到了鱼人二代的小说了，目前我自己是没时间玩，所以不知道剧情的底，但是CG的话，都是1-2s重复帧数，对比大作一般吧，就这样。

  • 能，只要把game文件夹中所有文件及文件夹移动即可。
  • 但是有利于也有弊，因为没有打包，所以解压出来的图片，视频，会爆开你的手机相册，所以介意的话，博客出门左转，另找资源了。
  • 因为安卓下载的人很少，而Gofile网盘七天内没人下载，就会生效，而Vikingfile网盘会有广告，我怕有些小白点错了，所以就这样了。
  1. 下载链接：
  • 英文原版：GOFILE
  • 英文原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正楷字体：GOFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁——正圆字体：GOFILE
  • 主体APK：GOFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版、AI意译汉化补丁和主体APK
  • 安装APK文件
  • 启动游戏，放行所有权限
  • 这时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，就自己手动大退
  • 然后解压英文原版压缩包文件
  • 将英文原版game文件夹中的所有文件及文件夹和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到以下路径： 
    1

    Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.CosyCafe/game
  • 最后启动游戏，选择简体中文即可
  • PS：移动端如果看不全路径，请向左滑动代码块。
  • 如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒

item.title: Contagion Crisis 传染危机
item.description:
Contagion Crisis [v0.6.0] [WeLoveMonsters]

Overview

剧情概要

  • Contagion Crisis is an adult monster survival-horror kinetic novel heavily influenced by games such as Resident Evil, Parasite Eve, and more.

  • In 2018, a contagion escapes into the city of Grimhaven, Washington, turning everything it touches into lust-fueled monsters. Sisters, Sarah and Ava, must traverse the city, doing their best to avoid the mutations as they attempt to reach sanctuary. Through their journey, the pair will seek the truth of the contagion’s outbreak; a task that will require them to unravel a web of lies that will change them both forever.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.6.0
  • 发行日期：2025-12-04

Changelog

更新日志
  • ~1000 renders
  • 33 animations
  • Additional ambience and sfx

Developer（入正地址）

  • Ko-fi
  • Itch.io
  • Subscribestar
  • Discord
  • Twitter

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 女性视角的动态小说，就跟看番剧一样，不过有一说一，有点猎奇了，但是能冲社保就行了。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-25
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Cross Realms 跨界
item.description:
Cross Realms [v0.4] [DuskDuck]

Overview

剧情概要
  • On the first day of your college life, you and a group of friends are sucked into a vortex. When you wake up, you realize you’re in a foreign place - this is not Earth. As you explore this new world, you discover it’s a Qi cultivation realm, where power determines everything.
Spoiler

  • There are nine Realms, each controlled by a dominant race: Humans, Demons, Deities, Spiritual Beasts, and more. Each Realm has a “spring” - a flow of Qi energy harvested from the Void, the space between Realms. Because of these springs, peace between the Realms is fragile and rarely lasts long. You arrive during the longest period of peace ever known, but how long will this so-called ‘peace’ really last?

  • As your journey continues, you uncover more secrets about these Realms. Someone in the shadows has been plotting and orchestrating your arrival. Will you be able to stand up for yourself in a world where many see you as nothing more than a useless ant?

  • The answer are yours to find.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py

item.title: New Horizon 新天域
item.description:
New Horizon [v0.4] [KawaiiSukebe]

Overview

剧情概要
  • What does a man have left after his father has gone missing, and his ex-girlfriend relentlessly broke up with him for seemingly no reason at all? An empty heart that lives through a monotonous everyday life. “Meeting you changed my world.” The fateful encounter got our story’s MC, Hirase Tatsuya, involved in something that could shake the whole country, or even the world. Come and unravel the secrets behind the MC’s missing father and all the unexpected bittersweet encounters with the girls.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2

  • 1 scene with side character Maki.
  • Added option to turn off KS commentary in-game.
  • Everyone’s favorite menu music from 0.1.5 is back

item.title: Oppai Odyssey 欧派奥德赛
item.description:
Oppai Odyssey [v0.5.0a] [Cryoxxx]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You are the captain of the USF starship Agni. Tasked with the mission of exploring uncharted planets in hopes of finding colonization targets, you will have the opportunity to experience the unique races and environments of the universe. Build friendship and share intimacy with your ragtag crew, as you traverse the mysteries of the universe and the nefarious plots of the USF. Oppai Odyssey features completely animated scenes and sexy situations.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • Major Main Story Episode

  • Character Events for Pip, Nyx, Lym, and Yaz
  • 3 new Crewmates
  • New Spanish and Chinese Translations
  • New Main Menu
  • Early chapter Repolishing (VN mode only for now)
  • Extended Zara event on Idris
  • 5 new events featuring Ms. Saeko
  • 5 new music tracks
  • 10 new sound effects

item.title: Pale Carnations 康乃馨俱乐部
item.description:
Pale Carnations [Ch.4 Up.6 Public] [Mutt & Jeff]

Overview

剧情概要
  • In Pale Carnations, step into the shoes of a tightly wound pre-med student pulled head first into a world of debauchery thanks to the influence of a waning childhood friend. As the newest employee at the Carnation Club, navigate your part in a series of cruel erotic games and sexual encounters. Will you give into your sadistic urges and be enticed by the club’s wealth and hedonism? Or perhaps at the end of it all, a flower of romance will bud, pushing you to leave the brothel’s sordid business behind.
  • Features a variety of intersecting storylines that sees you guide the performance of three women desperately competing for the brothel’s grand prize, uncover backroom dealings steeped in intrigue, and maneuver the day-to-day social life of a man ill at ease with his basest impulses.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Chapter 4 - Update 6 - Public
  • 发行日期：2025-10-10

Changelog

更新日志
  • 2,761 images
  • 104 animations
  • 55,714 words
  • Edwin meeting Rosalind in the prologue has been reshot (81 images), and 7 animations have been added to - that scene.

  • Itch.io
  • Patreon
  • Discord

item.title: Waifu Academy 二次元老婆学院
item.description:
Waifu Academy [v0.13.5] [Irphaeus]

Overview

剧情概要
  • In Waifu Academy, you play as young man (with a name of your choice, of course), who wishes to seek revenge after many years of harrowing ordeals… The game features more than 30 characters, each of which is unique and has a (hopefully) believable background. Most of the game scenes take place at a fictional private high school called, ‘Sazaki Academy.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.13.5
  • 发行日期：2025-11-29

Changelog

更新日志
  • Fixed and updated the Gallery.
  • New optional Kayane look.
  • New place the Devil’s Kiss aka Tendo Club.
  • Added Karma choices following previous events.
  • Added ~3800 lines of dialogue and script.
  • Added 9 new scenes with
  • 300 3D renders. -Added 26 new animations scenes.
  • Added 3 new musics, and 12 sounds/FX.
  • Fixed many typos.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon

item.title: New Family 新家庭
item.description:
New Family [v0.5.5] [King Peanut]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The story begins with the main character, who lost their parents at a young age, being taken in by a new family. This new family, though not related by blood, is a small, close-knit community that relies on one another. As the main character lives and grows with them, they share in each other’s lives and experiences. The unfolding relationships within this family and the events they encounter together form the central storyline​

关于汉化补丁

  • 翻译作者：落谦

  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Bloody Anomaly 血腥异常
item.description:
Bloody Anomaly [v0.1] [Dejavu]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The outbreak of the BA26 virus claimed thousands of lives and temporarily wiped out the usual rules. A vaccine with 93% effectiveness restored the illusion of safety, but you were unlucky, one of the 7% for whom it didn’t work… Well… there was no turning back.
  • Rumors spread that some of the infected were exhibiting strange, almost vampiric behavior.
Spoiler: More
  • Journalist Sera wrote: “They could no longer eat regular food. Their manners, habits, appetite… everything changed. I don’t know what was happening to them, but it was terrifying.”
  • And what about you? Once an orphan with nothing in your pocket, you clawed your way to the top, building a chemical empire and becoming a millionaire. Power, money, knowledge, everything was in your hands. Risk and criminal connections had long been part of your life, just like the church you built in the heart of the city, a towering mansion disguised as a place of worship.
  • And while the rumors kept spreading, no one knew what would happen next. The first wave may have been only a test, and the real consequences had yet to appear.
  • If the second stage of the virus begins, everything could change overnight. Oh… the vaccine does not work on you… And then you will have to choose: fight to survive or be consumed by the virus with no chance of recovery.

游戏类型

item.title: Champion of Realms 冠军人生
item.description:
Champion of Realms [v0.104] [Zimon]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 在一个由混乱而生的世界里，古代诸神为了避免世界末日的冲突，将他们的后代分开。他们为每个孩子创造了三个不同的时间维度，并将孩子们生存的关键任务委托给一个人：勇士。
  • 数万年以来，这位冠军一直守护着三维空间。但现在，这位冠军却消失得无影无踪。
  • 尽管主角竭尽全力，他还是被迫参加一场致命的比赛，以决定未来的冠军……以及所有人的命运。他能活下来吗？还是会被命运的重压压垮？
  • 幸运的是，在这场惊险的冒险中，他并不是孤单一人。几位值得信赖、美丽的盟友将与他并肩前行。他们齐心协力，一定能克服最艰难的挑战，体验最美妙的乐趣。
  • 你还在等什么？冒险就在眼前……

游戏信息

  • 建模引擎：Koikatsu Sunshine
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py

item.title: My Hentai Fantasy 我的hentai幻想
item.description:
My Hentai Fantasy [v0.13.5] [Naughty Capy]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You just wake up without remembering anything, apparently, you’re living a dream life, but why does everything seem so odd? You are about to go to university and your father is one of the richest men alive, but the fact that you don’t remember anything after waking up makes you very uneasy, so you try to find answers.
  • But who knows, maybe the answers you’re looking for are not worth it… Or are they? I guess it’s better if you find out for yourself.

游戏信息

版本信息

  • FINALLY, THE END OF TATSUMAKI’S ROUTE. This update includes events that you may never see unless you pick the right choices. It also has more renders and more animations than the first part, so you may need to play it twice to experience everything and unlock both endings. Just remember: the ending you choose will heavily affect the main story.

item.title: V.I.R.T.U.E.S. 美德
item.description:
V.I.R.T.U.E.S. [v17] [NoMeme]

Overview

剧情概要
  • This is a harem simulator. You, as a young capable college rich kid, versus 7 gorgeous girls with different backgrounds and personalities. The story is not only about sex, but also about romance and love fantasies. Try immerse yourself in the plots, discover more of the girls, and enjoy the feeling of developing your harem.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：PlayHome
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：17
  • 发行日期：2023-02-17

Changelog

更新日志
  • It has been almost 1 year since we released VIRTUES v16. Back then we really thought v16 would be the last major update of VIRTUES. We used 10 weeks to create an insane amount of content (700+ new pictures and 70+ animated scenes) and thought “this is it, we’ve put a good end to the journey of VIRTUES. It is not a perfect end, there are regrets, but it is still a good end. We made it. We finish our first project instead of abandoning it halfway. There may be a v17 at some point in the future, but it will be a minor update, you know, like a DLC kind of stuff.”
  • I kept this thought even until last December, until we really began to develop this v17 update. But as soon as I re-entered the world of VIRTUES, I changed my mind. I realized there were still so many things I want to tell, so many scenes I want to make for those girls, the girls that used to be a big part of my life for more than 2 years.
  • Thus I changed my plan, and I changed it again and again during the last two months. More and more scenes were added, more and more lines were written, and less and less time I slept every day. And in the end, this update became so big that we couldn’t even imagine it. It became even bigger than v16. It has more than 900+ new pictures and 70+ animated scenes, with the greatest amount of text.
  • V17 is the last major update of VIRTUES. It is the biggest update we’ve ever made, and maybe the lewdest one as well. Still, it is not a perfect end and there are regrets, but we have done our best and we hope you will enjoy our hard work.
  • I will write a post as the final summary of the journey of VIRTUES in a few days. As for now, let’s just take a brief look at what’s new in the update:
  • Irene’s solo ending
  • The silver kitten finally got her solo ending. Her ending contains two long branches, and each of them leads to a unique happy end. You will help this girl solve her confusion and decide the path of her future. Elisa’s solo ending
  • Just like her little daughter, this blonde milf’s solo ending also contains two long branches. This poor lady was deeply wounded from her previous marriage and she really needs you to take her away from the curse from her past.
  • The afterstory of your harem
  • There will be 4 major parts of your harem’s afterstory: Vera’s college dream, Uno’s real family, Senning’s daily life after her mother left the country, and the Shinyrost mother&daughter’s male worship. Each of them contains a tremendous amount of harem scenes.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Discord
  • Itch.io

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 很经典的一个游戏，CG放到现在依旧能打，而且瑟瑟剧情描写的很细腻，好像都有反差的那种，不愧是老艺术家的从容。
  • 当然，这游戏是沙盒的，所以会很多不能提取的文本，如果你遇到有些英文句子，影响到你游玩，请在博客留言，并且附上原文句子，我看在vscode上找到源码，再去通过ai汉化。
汉化补丁更新日志
  • 2026.01.19 06:00
    • 补链，并且统一人名。
  • 2026.01.19 16:30
    • 修复地名不显示汉化的bug。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-19
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Clown Squad 哥谭市
item.description:
Clown Squad [Prologue] [NoGlory]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The world loves lies — as long as theyâre funny, pretty, or heroic. You were never meant to be honest. You were meant to be a clown. A performer. A distraction. A joke. But thereâs a problem. You physically cannot lie. Jokes are built on exaggeration, nonsense, and falsehood. Comedy is a craft of bending the truth. And you? Youâre forced to tell it exactly as it is. Youâre cynical to your core. You think too sharply. You work harder than anyone around you. Your mind is a razor. And because of it — people treat you worse than someone who has nothing at all. This is a story about a man forced to be funny in a world that hates the truth. And now, for the first time, you get to decide: Will you break or will you break the world?​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

item.title: Inanna Revenge 伊南娜的复仇
item.description:
Inanna Revenge [Ep.3] [AtemX Games]

Overview

剧情概要
  • In Inanna Revenge, you play as Arthur (customizable name), a 21-year-old young man living a dull and uneventful life with his stepsister—until one fateful day, that life comes to an abrupt end. But death doesn’t mark the end of your journey. A goddess named Ea offers you a chance to be reincarnated into a new world, one brimming with magic and adventure. What seems like the beginning of a fairy tale quickly reveals a harsher reality. To carve out your place in this new world, you’ll need to fight, face countless challenges, make tough decisions, and build meaningful relationships. Will you rise to the occasion, or be consumed by the trials ahead?
Spoiler
  • In Inanna Revenge, you won’t just control your character’s relationships with others, but also shape his personal development. Numerous choices allow you to develop your character into someone compassionate or ruthless, depending on your preferences. These choices will influence how your character interacts with others in various situations. Moreover, you can also affect the mentality of some of your love interests, deciding whether to pursue a romantic relationship with them or guide them into becoming submissive, obedient companions.
  • The game is a Visual Novel with a strong RPG feel. A turn-based combat system will be used to resolve certain conflicts, and your characters will gain levels, allowing them to allocate stat points and learn new skills. You’ll also find puzzles to solve later in the game.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Episode 3
  • 发行日期：2026-01-17

Changelog

更新日志

-New content - Episode 3:

    • 1491+ new images
    • 118 new animations
    • 21,250+ new lines of code
    • New music tracks
    • New sound effects
  • Previous content:
    • Added Russian and Simplified Chinese translations for Episodes 1 and 2.
    • Fixed various typos in the French and English texts.
    • It will no longer be possible to access Regina’s ‘revenge’ route if your MC is compassionate and has not shown a desire for revenge in - their previous choices.
    • The king’s letter received during Episode 2 will now appear in your inventory after reading it.
    • All AI-generated images (16) presenting the lore at the start of Episode 1 have been replaced with standard renders.
  • Bug fixes:
    • Fixed an issue with Sylvia’s dialogue when leaving the blacksmith in Cascus, where relationship points were not being properly awarded.
    • Fixed a bug that incorrectly saved one of the choices related to Manon during the bath scene under certain conditions.
    • The "NTS Content" option will no longer appear as both enabled and disabled if you turn it off in one save and then load another save with the option enabled.
  • User Interface:
    • The achievements screen is now accessible during gameplay without needing to return to the main menu.
    • The text corresponding to the percentage of mining and agricultural workers in the ducal codex has been swapped to correctly match the slider used to adjust this parameter.
    • Redesigned the deduction screen after the Deerwood investigation to make it more intuitive.
    • Visual overhaul of the language selection screen at first launch and in the options menu.
    • Visual redesign of the inventory screen.
    • Added a "Translation" section to the "About" screen with links to the translators’ social networks.
    • Added a notification indicating that attribute or skill points are available on character portraits in the relationships screen.
  • Combat system:
    • Added tabs to categorize the MC’s spells by element during combat.
    • Multi-target spells (such as Sylvia’s Lightning Bolt) can now be cancelled, even after selecting an initial target.
    • Level cap increased to 16
    • Level 16 skills have been added
    • Added new mechanics tied to these skills
    • Added new consumable items
  • Miscellaneous:
    • Ren’Py has been updated to version 8.4.1, fixing some bugs and improving performance.
    • When choosing your name, letters beyond the first are no longer forced to lowercase.
    • When choosing Sylvia’s name, names containing "ea" are no longer forbidden.
    • Experience gained by your partners through Inanna’s blessing is now based on your level rather than theirs.
    • Refactored certain parts of the code to better support translations requiring font changes (using non-Latin characters).
    • Files in the TL folder will no longer be archived, making it easier for Russian- and Chinese-speaking players to update translations.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Itch.io
  • Patreon
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 落谦不懂法语，所以我只统一了主要角色的人名。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-17
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: That New Teacher 那位新老师
item.description:
That New Teacher [v0.8.0] [RogueOne]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You’ve just been hired at a prestigious and unconventional institute of higher learning, known for its ground-breaking curriculum, radical pedagogical methods, and strict disciplinary policies. Your new position is unlike any other: you are The Enforcer.
  • As The Enforcer, you are the sole authority responsible for administering discipline across the student body, with complete discretion. The Institute’s enigmatic benefactors have established a controversial behavioral system known as the PARE Program (Performance and Accountability through Reward and Enforcement). This initiative empowers you to manage students through a carefully structured balance of incentives and consequences, based on their academic performance, conduct, and adherence to institutional expectations.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.8.0 Public
  • 发行日期：2025-12-20

Changelog

更新日志
  • 33,000 New Words
  • 1800 New Images
  • 97 New Animations
  • 12 new unlockable photos!
  • Added a short prologue to the start of the game, to smooth over the introduction.
  • Redesigned ENTIRE UI (again)
  • Changed Georgia’s first unlockable Photo
  • New Profile page backgrounds: Chrissy, Daphne

item.title: Eternum 永恒世界
item.description:
Eternum [V0.9.0] [Caribdis]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You’re moving with your best friend to the city of Kredon, home to some of the best schools and universities in the country, to continue your studies. However, in Kredon, there’s only one thing everyone talks about: ETERNUM—the virtual, hyper-reality MMORPG game released a few years ago that revolutionized the world of technology.
Spoiler
  • With a neural implant that recreates the five senses, it becomes impossible to distinguish between the game and the real world. Thousands of servers form the network of Eternum: from colorful, magic-filled fantasy worlds to foggy sci-fi cities, no world is beyond reach. Nevertheless, looking beyond the surface, there’s a darker side to this pretty facade: black markets, torture, rape, illegal content trafficking, unlawful assemblies, data theft… Eternum follows the rules of no man. For some reason, governments turn a blind eye to this; there’s no regulation and no control. Some say it’s because the game is highly addictive, some say it’s because the market moves millions of dollars daily, some say those in power have been bribed, and others say… there’s something else going on. And you? What’s your role in this story? Well… That’s up to you now.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.9.0
  • 发行日期：2025-12-27

Changelog

更新日志
  • 2050+ new images
  • 90+ new animations
  • 20900+ new lines of code
  • 42+ new music tracks
  • 100+ new sound effects
  • Several render and code fixes

Developer（入正地址）

  • Itch.io
  • Patreon
  • Discord
  • SubscribeStar
  • Twitter

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 安卓显示0.8.6是正常的，我懒得移植了，反正是个载体，而且作者也没用新版renpy。
  • 这次落谦上传了存档，这个存档PC和安卓都是通用的，不用你从头再打，直接在最后一页读取0.8的结尾，无缝衔接！！！
汉化补丁更新日志
  • 2025.12.27 04:40
    • 统一0.9版本的部分专有名词，主要角色人名已修
    • 修复0.9之前版本，作者修改语法及句子，导致补丁无法读取翻译文本的BUG
    • 手动配合AI提取renpy提取不出来的文本
  • 2025.12.27 06:20
    • 修正统一0.9专有名词，落谦是边玩边修，补丁会慢慢更新。
  • 2025.12.27 07:30
    • 修复水友反馈的文字效果bug
  • 2025.12.28 10:00
    • 依旧统一0.9的专有名词
  • 2025.12.30 13:40
    • 依旧统一0.9的专有名词与提取screen.rpy中renpy无法提取的文本
  • 2026.01.01 15:20
    • 补充了比武招亲的四首诗
  • 2026.01.17 22:30
    • 补链接，并且替换新的正圆字体，因为之前有人反馈，旧字体卡。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-01
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: My Bully Is My Lover 我的爱人是恶女
item.description:
My Bully Is My Lover [Chapter 2 - Episode 1 [BETA]] [NiiChan]

Overview

剧情概要
  • In this emotionally charged narrative-driven game, you step into the shoes of a protagonist who has endured the scars of high school bullying. Haunted by memories of a girl who made life unbearable, you’ve journeyed through both literal and metaphorical realms of heaven and hell, reshaping your identity and vowing for retribution. Yet, as adulthood dawns, you realize the futility of clinging to past grudges and choose a path of moving forward.
Spoiler
  • But fate has a twist in store. Your tranquil life is upended when the same high-school bully, along with her friends become your housemates, thanks to your landlady’s new rental arrangements. Unprepared and unnerved, you brace for a resurgence of old conflicts. However, what unfolds is a journey far more profound and unexpected.
  • “My Bully is My Lover” is more than a game; it’s a journey of healing, understanding, and the unexpected ways of life intertwine. Prepare to embark on a path where past pain paves the way for growth and unlikely bonds.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Chapter 2 - Episode 1
  • 发行日期：2026-01-03

Changelog

更新日志
  • 1073+ images
  • 8611 lines of code (6131 main content + 2480 phone content)
  • 41 animations
  • Klara’s 1st Arc
  • Introduction to Emma’s Final Arc
  • Introduction to Naomi’s Final Arc
  • New: Phone System
  • 82 new background music & SFX

item.title: Realm Invader 领域入侵者
item.description:
Realm Invader

Overview

剧情概要
  • In this game, you follow a young soulless shell for you to self-insert into man who lives in a world very similar to yours. Recently, he’s been riddled with several mysterious ailments, including headaches, goosebumps, and an inexplicable sense of dread.
  • These symptoms were a warning, this man finds himself in the middle of a cataclysmic event, at least, it would seem so. Where cataclysms will typically lead to the destruction of a world, this one has led to a birth. The nature of his world has shifted around him. There are new species, an altered society, and magic.
  • He needs to learn about his new circumstances and what he can do with his new magical abilities. This man will slowly come to realize why he was sent to this world and walks a journey to unravel the mystery of his existence.
  • …
  • …
  • …
  • …
  • Oh, yeah, and he fucks a bunch of people on the way.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Episode 2 - Part 2
  • 发行日期：2025-08-01

Changelog

更新日志

  • Patreon
  • Discord

PS

  • 2026.01.15 00:00
    • 补链
    • 提取出renpy无法提取的文本，并且通用ai进行意译，已统一人名。
  • 2026.01.15 12:00
    • 修复打了补丁，进不去游戏的bug
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-15
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Driven by Desire 情欲驱动
item.description:
Driven by Desire [v0.3.5 Public] [KloppStyle]

Overview

剧情概要
  • A simple boy from the village, having reached adulthood and finished his studies, during his everyday rural routine asks himself the question - “What’s next? Will I stay here forever or will I overcome my fears and try my hand in the big city?” Will the big city lure the young man with sexy girls and great prospects, or will he stay in the village and never experience the world beyond?​

item.title: xxxFiles 开心超人
item.description:
xxxFiles [v0.1b] [Caine.Totally.Sane]

Overview

剧情概要
  • About this game. Basically Prototype (or Venom) but with sex. Not much to say here. You don’t have a traumatic past or anything, just an alien who enjoys copulating.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Koikatsu Sunshine
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：日系风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.1b
  • 发行日期：2025-12-24

Changelog

更新日志
  • NEW CHANGELOG
  • A present for everyone: Go to the convenience store and talk to the clerk.
  • RIKO GOOD route added: No new animation though, I just make it so choosing to be the good guy will not punish players with missed events/scenes
  • RILEY route added: I add some story contents for RILEY so players can improve their stats while having something to look forward to.
  • REI route added: The reason is the same as Riley, but Rei events are quite few, but should be enough to keep players entertained
  • A new area: Continue with the story to unlock. A whole new cast, but a lot of them are under development, should be ready for the next update.
  • A new character route: From the new area.
  • A minigame: For the new character route. (Don’t worry, you can skip the minigame if you don’t feel like playing).
  • Replay and Gallery: I just quickly add one, so it is quite simple actually, but it gets the job done, albeit a bit ugly looking. There will be some missing - videos in the Replay but I will add them later on. The Gallery is empty though, main reason is below. And no, I will not sell a key to fully unlock the Replay and Gallery, you will need to play the game to unlock stuff. Crazy!
  • Screenshot: At first I want players to be able to take their own pictures and have them in the gallery. Sadly, there’s no good way to do this with Ren’py. - Still, it is a pretty cool function. Try it in game with H key. Unfortunately, mobile players will not get this content as I haven’t got the time to port the - UI and key binding to touch screen.
  • Save naming/deleting: Also something I quickly put in, a framework from BadMustard, to let you name and delete save files easily.
  • Audio control: I have separated the audio channels for Text and H-videos, so you can now customize it to your own liking.
  • Transparent textbox: The textbox transparency can now be customized as well.
  • CHEAT: yes, you get free cheat. Don’t need to be a paid member or anything.
  • A LOT of other minor additions to make the game feel more alive.
  • CHANGES
  • Being the good guy: So quite a few players want the game to be less gory or corrupted. I got you. Most (I think…) scenes with tentacles/gore are now - skippable or avoidable, and I plan to change how I approach new content, such as with the new character, you can choose to avoid ALL of her H-scenes and still make progress, like a normal dating sim. Crazy? It took all of my 2 brain cells to think of a suitable script orz
  • Grinding: Changes made so playing t he game feels less like a chore. I still want to keep some elements of grind though because that is my thing. So I add - Cheat for anyone who doesn’t share my taste.
  • ode: So I change A LOT of my code. That’s why you will need a fresh start. This is mainly to ensure other updates will be more smoothly. I hope I don’t have to make huge changes like this again…
  • Performance: With changes to the code, I have to take a different route for those moving sprites/pictures. And it looks like this hurts the performance quite a bit. This is on my to-do list, to add an option to turn all those dynamic sprites to static ones. Still trying to find a solution though, but it is high on my list.
  • BUGS
  • As a sole creator, I try to play test the game during and after development. Unfortunately, it is impossible for me to recreate every possible choice the players can make that may break the game, especially in a game with different choices. So if you find any bugs, please report it in the discord server under the bugs-report channel and I will take a look at it.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Twitter
  • Pixiv

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 小心超人，开心超人。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2025-12-26
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Apocalypse 2059 启示录2059
item.description:
Apocalypse 2059 [v0.3 Special] [BigH4nd.Inc]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Apocalypse 2059 Welcome to the savage world of 2059, where survival is a daily struggle and civilization is nothing but a distant memory. The World That Was In 2030, an event known as “The Cataclysm” forever changed the face of Earth. Nuclear weapons claimed lives in an instant, plunging the world into a devastating nuclear winter that lasted over a decade. Civilization, law, and morality crumbled into dust. The surface became an inferno, forcing what little plant life remained to retreat underground. For the few who survived, existence became a constant battle against extinction. Twenty years have passed. The pre-war generation grows old, while a new generation rises, knowing nothing of the world that came before.
Spoiler
  • Your Story Begins The story takes place in the year 2059. You, the protagonist, have been living in solitude in a shelter since your birth. These peaceful days are changed by the appearance of a mysterious woman. At her urgent request, you’ll embark on a perilous journey across the savage lands of what was once civilization. Unforgettable Characters Your path will cross with unique survivors, each shaped by the merciless world they inhabit: A reckless and confident villain with her own agenda A young, sensitive tribal leader struggling to protect her people A ruthless warlord carving out her empire silver-tongued treasure hunter seeking fortune in the ruins

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.3 Christmas Special
  • 发行日期：2025-12-24

Changelog

更新日志
  • What’s New in Winter Special
  • Step into a completely different world from our usual wasteland - a warm, peaceful winter evening where MC and the characters gather without danger or survival struggles. This standalone episode features:
  • Character Routes:
  • Skylar’s Route
  • Emily’s Route
  • Lana’s Route
  • Content:
  • About 1 hour of new story content
  • 700+ new CGs
  • Completely standalone from the main story
  • Free for everyone, as always
  • About Harlie’s Route
  • I need to be honest with you: Harlie’s route is not included in this release.
  • I know many of you were looking forward to her story, and I’m genuinely sorry for not delivering what I promised. The reasons are straightforward - time management failures and trying to maintain quality standards rather than rushing something subpar.
  • My commitment: Harlie’s complete route will be finished and released as an update in 2026, as part of what should have been in the initial release.
  • I apologize for this disappointment, but I’d rather delay than deliver something that doesn’t do her character justice.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Discord

item.title: The Better Deal 更好的交易
item.description:
The Better Deal [v0.8b] [Ze-gam-eZ]

Overview

剧情概要
  • A story-focused, highly animated visual novel with several love interests, both male and female.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.8b
  • 发行日期：2025-12-18

Changelog

更新日志
  • The update contains some bug fixes, fixed typos and translations.
  • This update covers Chapter 3 — the climax of the story. While the earlier parts of the game focused on determining the main heroine’s love interest, here you’ll be making choices between life and death. And of course, all your previous decisions still have a major impact on how the story unfolds.
  • The update adds 1,657 images, 34 animations, 5 music tracks, and 34 sound effects. In terms of content volume, it’s roughly equal to the very first release of the game (the one on Steam). However, because the story branches extensively, each individual path won’t be very long — which I hope is clear.
  • This update includes all the bad endings. If you manage to complete this chapter, everything ahead will be only good endings, plus one or two “gray” ones.

  • Itch.io
  • Steam

item.title: Shattered Minds 破碎的心灵
item.description:
Shattered Minds [v0.23 Beta] [eXtasy Games]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Shattered Minds is an open-world game, in which you take control over the life of a college student.
  • Your normal life is thrown out of whack after you realize you have the power to control the minds of others.
  • You will use this power to make all your dreams, desires and wishes come true!
  • A world with countless quests, figures, plots and locations are waiting to be discovered and controlled by you!
  • Shattered Minds includes plenty of animations, a licensed soundtrack and atmospheric sound effects!
  • Be ready to experience a game full of sexy adventures!
  • All paired with a thrilling, mysterious yet humorous plot.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.23 Beta Hotfixed
  • 发行日期：2025-12-19

Changelog

更新日志
  • NEW QUEST: In MC’s secret service (Diana– Quest 1)
  • The MC recruits Diana for a top-secret spy mission. He convinces her that only the two of them can save the city from the (totally-not-fictional) - - organization, D.O.O.M. (Department Of Omnipotent Masterminds).
  • NEW QUEST: Operation: Mindfall (Diana– Quest 2)
  • As she successfully follows every false clue the MC plants, Diana becomes more and more entangled in a web of lies and over-the-top movie plots. No longer able to think straight, she is led to a final showdown with the leader of D.O.O.M., Dr. Eclipse!
  • New harem member: Diana
  • Diana will become a regular member of your harem, with new scenes available at your home and at the police station. She can become pregnant and she can - move into your house, which unlocks two additional scenes, one in the basement and one with Sarah in the garden.
  • New Smartphone Wallpaper: Diana
  • New side character: Barbara
  • She is a professor at Spring Hill College and becomes available after you purchase the college. She is not a fan of the current changes to the institution or the staff surrounding Dean Baker. You need to guide her to her place in your new college…
  • Quality of Life feature, Favorites Tab in Contacts App:
  • You can now click the new added star icon next to any Harem member’s name to add them to your favorites list. This will make it much easier to quickly - find your favorite characters.
  • Quality of Life feature, Advanced Quest Tracking:
  • You can now display up to four quests simultaneously on your main HUD
  • Quality of Life feature, Simultaneous Notifications:
  • The game now supports displaying multiple popups simultaneously (such as Level Up, Room Build, Pregnancy Completed). Additionally, the game now clearly - indicates exactly which character completed their pregnancy.
  • Quality of Life feature, Revised Messenger:
  • Every message you send and receive is now saved, so you can re-read them anytime! Just a heads-up: Messages you got before this update won’t show up in - your history!
  • Quality of Life feature, more Moan Sounds:
  • In total, there are now 6 different moan sets, consisting of up to 16 individual sound clips.
  • Each character has been assigned a fixed set. You will now hear higher/younger-sounding moans, deeper/older-sounding moans, faster, slower, and more.
  • Quality of Life feature, Parallax Effect:
  • The parallax effect has been optimized. It’s much smoother now, expecially when changing rooms.
  • Engine Update: The game now runs on Ren’Py 8.5. This ensures stability across all supported platforms and stores.
  • Translations: All translations have been updated with V0.23 content and are up to date! Also, Polish, Turkish, and Traditional Chinese have been added as new languages.
  • bug fixes, rebalancing and spelling corrections

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Steam
  • Discord
  • Instagram
  • Subscribestar
  • Twitter

落谦酱便利贴

item.title: Dawnfall 黎明之秋
item.description:
Dawnfall [v0.2] [Zebual]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Dawnfall is a modern fantasy visual novel that follows a young man about to start his university life, unaware that secrets tied to his past and destiny are slowly awakening. Vampires, witches, and angels aren’t just stories… they exist, hidden within a delicate balance that’s beginning to crack. As a member of a secret organization called Veilkeepers, Rex will be forced to face not only the darkness stirring beneath the surface… but also the truth of who he really is. Your choices will shape fate, maybe even the fate of the world.​

item.title: Fog of War 战争迷雾
item.description:
Fog of War [v0.5.1] [Story Machine Studios]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Rex Richards, born with an enhanced eidetic memory and a natural born soldier becomes the youngest to ever make Delta Force. Aka “The Unit”. After feeling like he is losing his humanity on the battlefield he retires. Rex uses his sciences degree he obtained while serving to attend R. Winters Medical University, where he tries to escape his clandestine operator past. Will Rex find solace on his new chosen path or become the monster he fears? Sometimes walking away does not mean you escape without a fight.​

item.title: Sinful Summer 罪恶之夏
item.description:
Sinful Summer: A Tale of Forbidden Love [Ch.3.4] [Ruykiru]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Embark on an unforgettable journey with Erik and Lyna, two young twins entangled in a passionate web of desires. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of a private tropical island villa, their reunion after a year abroad sparks a fiery exploration of emotions that defy traditional boundaries.
  • As they tread the line between repressed feelings and mutual attraction, their bond deepens and the craving for the forbidden becomes impossible to ignore. With the arrival of their mother Helga on the horizon, will they succumb to temptation or resist the call of their primal urges? Discover the twists and turns of this compelling narrative through a kinetic visual novel where love, family, and desire intertwine in very interesting ways…
  • DISCLAIMER: THIS IS NOT A GAME, IT’S A VISUAL NOVEL WITHOUT CHOICES.
  • Think of it as a book, TV show or movie, but with lots of porn. Also this is NOT your usual incest story about a mindless poorly-written harem. It has a big focus on the taboo itself and making the family relationships mean something more than just a label. Expect very heavy incestuous dialogue here, without any stupid censorship patches. Also lesbian scenes and both male and female protags.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Chapter 3.4
  • 发行日期：2025-11-29

Changelog

更新日志
  • Story continued: +640 new renders, +55 animations (total of 7 minutes of animated scenes!)
  • H-Scenes: +1 mom-son-daughter (long), +1 mom-daughter (very long!), +2 bro-sis
  • General improvements:
  • Upgraded Helga and Erik character models
  • Fixed gallery unlock button logic: becomes “unlock all” whenever you’re missing at least one (in new updates for example)
  • Optimized code (most saves broke, sorry! use the chapter select)
  • Remade options menu; much better clarity.
  • Developer Accountability Report:
  • Months since project start: ~21 months (Feb 2024 - Nov 2025)
  • Number of total updates released so far: 16 updates
  • Next milestone: Chapter 3.5 (target: ~January)
  • Development challenges: Learning the software to properly make the new AI animations so they don’t look like low effort bad quality crap

Developer（入正地址）

  • Discord

item.title: Agent17 特工17
item.description:
Agent17 [v0.25.9] [HEXATAIL]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You are an ordinary-looking pervert with average grades, blending into the background at school without anyone paying much attention to you. Occasionally, you may face bullying from troublemakers, possibly even being robbed or coerced into doing their bidding. However, one fateful day while heading home, you stumble upon a damaged phone. The phone initiated transformation in your life.
Spoiler: More

  • This phone has the power to solve all your problems. Contrary to popular belief, an unknown individual called Agent17 obeys the commands of whoever picks up the phone, allowing you to instruct her to carry out any task. Suddenly, your life takes a dramatic turn for the better. You triumph over the bullies who tormented you, and you exact revenge on the teachers and principals who held you in contempt.

  • The mundane school life that once held no interest for you begins to change as you start interacting with a multitude of talented and captivating individuals. As your connections deepen, you gradually uncover their hidden secrets. With the formidable abilities of Agent17 at your disposal, you also delve into their unknown mysteries. Moreover, you realize that your life is brimming with countless fascinating discoveries awaiting your exploration.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.25.9
  • 发行日期：2025-04-17

item.title: Steps of Debauchery 堕落之路
item.description:
Steps of Debauchery [Ep.5.0-patreon] [Fooxied]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Follow the steps of Riley, a girl who moves from a small town to the city to help her husband, Mike, pursue his dreams. While Mike is busy with his bar, Riley supports him wholeheartedly and often puts others’ well-being above her own. This leads her into unexpected situations, where she discovers more about her true self and deepest desires.
  • She explores her sexuality in college and unravels her fantasies, takes on the role of a waitress at the bar, engages in activities with an elderly neighbor, streams adventures with his grandson and that’s just the tip of the mountain. Riley’s world is opening wide in front of her, and she waits for you to explore it.

item.title: Ms.Denvers 丹弗斯女士
item.description:
Ms.Denvers [v0.1.1.8] [Pop Toc]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Wanda Denvers is a 40-year-old single mother with a son and two daughters. She’s the principal of Middleton High School. This story focuses on her life after 5 years of divorce, as she battles with the task of having to take care of 3 people on her own. It’s now been so long since she had a love life she feels more lonely than ever before. How will she fill the pit of emptiness in her life? You decide.​

  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2025-12-14
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Cradle Beyond the Veil 异界摇篮
item.description:
City Devil: Restart [v0.4.0 Public] [Sabirow]

Overview

剧情概要
  • This isn’t your usual life sim with predictable drama and a checklist of girls to… well, you know.
  • Instead, our visual novel offers something for everyone — from high-quality adult scenes and animations that won’t disappoint, to a carefully crafted world and story for those who enjoy deeper immersion. We believe you’ll find plenty to enjoy as you start exploring Cradle at its very beginning.
  • We’ve aimed to create a visual novel that stands out — and we believe we’ve built a solid foundation for something truly special. If you’re curious to explore a story somewhere between fiction and “wait, that could actually happen” — welcome.

item.title: Phoenixes 凤凰
item.description:
Phoenixes [v15.0.02] [NoMeme]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The story of PHOENIXES takes place in a world where both magic and science are well developed, a world where the superhero is really a thing. You, a wanderer in the junction between light and shadow, are now dragged into the cusp of the fight between heroes and villains. The city is falling apart and justice is being corrupted, you will have to take the responsibility and … … … …
  • Nah, that sounds boring, why don’t you just enjoy an easy life in this urban fantasy world and get all the hot strong beauties in your harem no matter whether they are heroes or villains? That solves the fight too, right?​

item.title: Wild Cats 野猫
item.description:
Wild Cats [v0.3 Public] [LopaPhi]

Overview

剧情概要
  • You are a highly anticipated up and coming volleyball star. Or rather, you were up until you destroyed your shoulder and your prospects along with it by overworking yourself. Now you’re just a nobody who drowned your sorrows away with a series of poor life choices.
Spoiler

  • This story takes place after a wake up call following a year of wallowing in despair with a life that spiralled downhill under the shadow of the star volleyball prospect you once were. You have just received a vague invitation for a meeting from the Dean of Baskerville State University, a highly prestigious university, regarding a potential scholarship when no other universities would give the current you a second glance.

  • The condition of this scholarship however would turn out to be facing your demons as you return to the sport you turned your back on in a new role, becoming the coach of the school’s women’s volleyball team.

  • But little did you know that facing your demons would be the easiest part of this task as the team is riddled with fatal problems, each threatening to end your scholarship left, right, and centre! Yet by earnestly facing these girls and their issues with your eyes wide open, you might just end up growing in a way you never thought you would. Are you ready to coach the BSU Wild Cats and lead them to victory?

游戏信息

游戏类型

item.description:

Overview

游戏概述
  • Desert Stalker puts you in control of a seasoned antiquity scavenger, a man whose main objective is finding rare objects in the ruins of civilization. Make major decisions about how you interact with the world around you, enter into erotic relationships, and live with the consequences of either dominating or saving both the people and landscape of post-apocalyptic Egypt.​

item.title: The Seven Realms 七界
item.description:
The Seven Realms [R3 v1.03] [SeptCloudGames]

Overview

剧情概要
  • For four hundred years, Atlas (name can be changed) has tried to maintain a semblance of peace throughout the realm. Since the death of their Queen and a great apathy seized their king, it fell to Atlas, the prince of the vampires, to restore order. So when he smells an unfamiliar scent that should not have been amongst a party of humans, he goes to investigate and meets Leyala.
  • Leyala seems to be hiding something, and by trying to undercover what, Atlas starts a chain of events that will cause them to venture across The Seven Realms.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py

更新日志
  • 544 New Images
  • 6 New Multi-Angle Animations (24 angles)
  • 8 New Trophies
  • 3 New Gallery Entries
  • A few notes for this update:
  • To access the side paths, load a save from the very end of Realm 3’s main story, or play again, up to the end. The side path menu will automatically appear after the main story’s final cinematic.
  • If you played the previous side paths update, and loading only displays the “Please Save Here” screen, scrolling up on your mouse should roll it back to the Side Path Menu.
  • This update is currently only available in English. The side paths will be translated and updated in due course.

item.title: Astreon 星宿
item.description:
Astreon [Ch.2 v0.3.5] [NoGlory]

Overview

游戏概述
  • In the year 2032, humanity stands on the brink of a technological breakthrough. A new material, developed by a group of scientists, possesses not only extraordinary strength, hyper-elasticity, and energy-saving properties, but also a unique, or rather exceptional, ability to self-repair. This capability turned the material into a regenerative pill, allowing people with limited abilities to become fully functional humans, while also making them stronger, smarter, and even extending their lifespan.
Spoiler: More
  • However, fearing the consequences of such power, the scientists decide to destroy the records, reports, and everything related to their research. They scattered, each going their own way. But as is often the case, someone found the remnants of this work. Ignoring the dangers, they decided to complete it, which eventually led to the formation of a globally banned terrorist organization called “Masquerade.” In response, leaders of major corporations launched a large-scale operation to eliminate the individual responsible and eradicate everything related to the research. You are a former soldier, unable to bear the guilt of the atrocities committed during the operation. You retreat to a remote location on the edge of the world, a small town cut off from the rest of civilization, where you planned to live a peaceful life with your wife and children, far removed from all the troubles of the past. But, as often happens, things do not go according to plan. One day, when your wife goes on a business trip to a certain research institute, she suddenly stops contacting you. In an attempt to find out what happened, you embark on a journey. Days, weeks, months, and years pass… Eventually, you come to terms with the fact that you may never see your wife again, burying all your emotions deep inside. Then, one day, your son arrives, asking for your help and with a glimmer of hope that not all is lost, that there is still a small chance to restore your peaceful life.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说

item.title: Mayfly 蜉蝣
item.description:
Mayfly [v0.2 Reset] [JasonTon]

Overview

游戏概述

  • “The city’s sewers stink of blood and rust. Portraits of the wealthy and powerful line the streets, attempting to cover up the heinous crimes they’ve committed.”

  • “Is it truly brightness and warmth that meets you after suffering?” your life.

Spoiler

  • The story is set in the city of Devon, the country’s only mega city. Plagued by a glaring wealth gap, Devon eventually divided into the Uppercity, where company execs and corpos live amidst opulence and luxury, and the Undercity, where factory workers and gangsters, including triads, dwell.

  • A decade ago, a phenomenon of unknown origin resulted in the sudden emergence of superpowers among individuals in and around the city, primarily among teenagers. However, this unexpected development presented a formidable challenge for the government, as these superpowered individuals started to engage in criminal activities. In particular, they targeted the Uppercity due to deep-rooted inequality, resorting to acts such as kidnapping and murder of the wealthy.

  • To tackle the rising crime rates, the government is compelled to implement two bills: the Vigilante Act and the Superpowers Act. The former empowers selected individuals with superpowers to go beyond traditional law enforcement measures to combat criminals, while the latter treats superpowered individuals differently from regular humans, eliminating age restrictions and establishing dedicated prisons for them.

  • Over time, superpowered crime in Devon steadily decreased thanks to the state-funded Vigilantes who are entrusted with the task of upholding justice. However, as the Vigilante force expanded, the balance started to shift as some Vigilantes with concealed motives became a new source of instability in the city. Additionally, after the initial surge of superpowers, no new superpowers have emerged in Devon. This results in a growing public demand for the abolition of the Vigilante Bill, and a change in public perception of Vigilantes from once-revered heroes to a more critical stance.

  • In such a setting, where you are a member of the Vigilantes, are you truly willing to let others dictate your fate? I believe the answer is unequivocally “Never.” Every decision you make, whether significant or seemingly inconsequential, has the potential to impact the relationships and alliances you form during your journey.

  • Is it to live fleetingly like a mayfly in this superficially vibrant city, or to leave a lasting legacy as a legend in the streets?

  • “The power to determine your destiny rests in your hands.”

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.2 Reset
  • 原版发布日：2025-01-22

Changelog

更新日志
  • 1135+ New Renders
  • 14 new animated CGs
  • 3100+ entirely new lines of story text
  • 6850+ entirely new lines of code
  • 30+ new music tracks
  • 100+ new sound effects
  • New end credits scene
  • The rendering quality has been significantly enhanced
  • Added Volumetric Light/Volumetric Fog
  • Higher-polygon models and new skeletal rigs have been added to the characters, allowing for more refined and detailed body movements
  • The MC’s model and skin have been updated, making him look… more handsome, perhaps?
  • Significant optimizations have been made to the transitions and sound effects in version 0.1, with a revision rate of over 70%
  • A cheat document has been added… Open it, and it will guide you on which choices to make

item.title: Milfy Day 徐娘半老之日
item.description:
Milfy Day [v0.8.9] [Red Lighthouse]

Overview

游戏概述
  • Milfy Day is a visual novel game, you’ll play as a young man who has just moved into this small town. You’re staying with two hot mature women and their families. Because your family is going through a crisis, you need to revive your family, meet more local residents, help them and discover the secrets of the town. Of course the most important thing is that you have to successfully graduate and find a partner at the school prom.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select 2
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.8.9
  • 原版发布日：2025-10-16
  • 汉化分享日：2025-10-26

Changelog

更新日志
  • New Angelina content.
  • New Zoey content.
  • New Syndra content.
  • A new girl. New dialogues.
  • Text correction.
  • Some renders fixes.
  • New portraits.
  • Bug fixes.

Developer(入正地址)

  • Patreon
  • Twitter
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • PS：应该是没有漏翻的句子，有可能部分人名错翻了？（音译问题）最近DeepSeek-V3老是这样，有时候会，有时候不会，但是用其他引擎，跑出来的意译效果没V3的好，落谦实在没时间去逐句意译了，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Ripples 涟漪
item.description:
Ripples [v0.8.0 Public] [Jestur]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Ripples is a sci-fi visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school. He reunites with his good friend Darci and sets off to school like any other day, but as the day goes on, he learns new information about his deceased father that has him questioning the truth about his death.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Honey Select
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：亚洲风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.8Public
  • 发行日期：2025-07-13

Changelog

更新日志
  • 2,216 New Images
  • 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total)
  • 6 New Gallery Scenes
  • 50+ New Music Tracks
  • 110+ New Sound Effects
  • 5 New Hidden Renders
  • Several Render Fixes
  • Several Code Fixes
  • Lots of Typos Fixed
  • New UI (Thanks, Pax)
  • New Main Menu
  • New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added)
  • Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene
  • And Other Small Things

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Subscribestar
  • Discord
  • Twitter

落谦酱便利贴

关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。
